item.title: Archive
item.description:
See my now page for my latest updates.

Archived on 2026-01-17

TV

Just finished up watching Season 1 and 2 of Severance. It was a pretty good show with some interesting concepts.

My least favorite time to be in is in between TV shows. Spy x Family Season 3 is slowly being dubbed, so maybe this is just something I need to wait for.

Games

Fortnite.

We recently started “Sea of Stars” as a cute co-op RPG thing. The first boss was really hard and we literally spent like 3 or 4 hours on it one night before looking up the beta on reddit.
